page.title: 12The Nothe Area.
page.content: In the last year{Weymouth and District {Borough Council}have been trying to make the{Nothe}a more interesting place.For instance,they have put more flowers and bushes there,also more paths and fences so you don't have to scramble up the grassy bank.The{Civic {Society}is responsible for the restoration work that is being done on the{Nothe Fort. The{Waterfall near Stone}Pier,is to commemorate the{Royal Wedding of {Prince Charles to Lady Diana. Instead of a big carpark on the Nothe there are parking bays which are almost hidden out of sight.The new Toilets are cleaner and better than the old ones.There are benches and {picnic tables}so you can look over the {harbour}while eating your lunch.There are also areas for having{barbecues.
